t: Safety, Health, and Well-Being - Amazon Sustainability
s: Safety is integral to everything we do at Amazon, and we strive to be safer every day for our employees, partners, and communities. Our work environments allow our employees, regardless of background, skill level, or experience, to work with confidence.

Making sure our people are safe at work is key to keeping our operations network running smoothly. As a member of WHS, you’ll collaborate with departments across the operations network on everything from material handling to ergonomics. Be part of shap...
